mil7.7.6:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘meghassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.7.6:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena uppannam kilesarajojallam vupasametabbam.
mil7.7.6:1.4: Idam, maharaja, meghassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.6:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, megho pathaviya unham nibbapeti;
mil7.7.6:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena mettabhavanaya sadevako loko nibbapetabbo.
mil7.7.6:2.3: Idam, maharaja, meghassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.6:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, megho sabbabijani viruhapeti;
mil7.7.6:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbasattanam saddham uppadetva tam saddhabijam tisu sampattisu ropetabbam, dibbamanusikasu sukhasampattisu yavaparamatthanibbanasukhasampatti.
mil7.7.6:3.3: Idam, maharaja, meghassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.6:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, megho ututo samutthahitva dharanitalaruhe tinarukkhalatagumbaosadhivanappatayo parirakkhati;
mil7.7.6:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena yoniso manasikaram nibbattetva tena yoniso manasikarena samanadhammo parirakkhitabbo, yoniso manasikaramulaka sabbe kusala dhamma.
mil7.7.6:4.3: Idam, maharaja, meghassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.6:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, megho vassamano naditalakapokkharaniyo kandarapadarasarasobbhaudapanani ca paripureti udakadharahi;
mil7.7.6:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena agamapariyattiya dhammameghamabhivassayitva adhigamakamanam manasam paripurayitabbam.
mil7.7.6:5.3: Idam, maharaja, meghassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
